data.name: Global Azure 2020 - Washington DC
data.description:
The Global Azure event is a free one-day mini-conference, taking place on April 23-25 2020 in venues across the world, driven by Microsoft Azure experts and community enthusiasts.
The Washington DC edition will take place on April 25th in the Arlington Tech eXchange (ATX)

relatedRecords.name: JuneteenthConf
relatedRecords.description: The Mission of JuneteenthConf is to provide a judgement free space for underrepresented people in tech to learn and grow and to amplify their voices. To be a counterbalance to the biases, implicit or otherwise, that hold our industry and our society back.
